thread.title: 'Genius' Super Bowl Commercial 2017 - Albert Einstein Plays Lady Gaga on Violin
thread.title_full: 'Genius' Super Bowl Commercial 2017 - Albert Einstein Plays Lady Gaga on Violin

author: Just Jared
title: 'Genius' Super Bowl Commercial 2017 - Albert Einstein Plays Lady Gaga on Violin
text:
Who knew Albert Einstein could play Lady Gaga ?
In a new promo for the upcoming series Genius , Einstein played Gaga ‘s “Bad Romance” on the violin, just minutes after Gaga ‘s Super Bowl performance. 
The 10-episode limited series stars Geoffrey Rush as Einstein and is based on the biography by Walter Isaacson , “Einstein: His Life and Universe.” 
The series is set to be a recurring anthology, with each new season focusing on an influential thinker or innovator.
Genius premieres on National Geographic on April 25. 
Watch the entire commercial below..

Genius 2017 Super Bowl Commercial
